description: This file provides functions to fetch and parse CSV data across the application, including utility functions for data fetching and specific methods to retrieve dashboard metrics from predefined CSV endpoints.

methods.name: fetchCsvData
methods.description: Fetches and parses a CSV file from the provided URL, returning a promise with parsed data.

methods.name: fetchDashboardMetrics
methods.description: Fetches multiple CSV datasets for dashboard metrics and returns an object containing all metrics.

ctags.name: engagement
ctags.pattern: /^    const [growth, engagement, revenue, ops, segments] = await Promise.all([$/
